fields.name: id
fields.description:
Stringified UUIDv4.
See [RFC 4112](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc4122)

codeSamples.name: Moralis NodeJS SDK

codeSamples.code:
from moralis import streams

api_key = "YOUR_API_KEY"
params = {
    "limit": 1.2, 
    "cursor": "", 
    "excludePayload": True, 
}

result = streams.history.get_history(
    api_key=api_key,
    params=params,
)

print(result)

pathParams.name: streamId
pathParams.description: The id of the stream the history will be replayed

pathParams.name: id
pathParams.description: The id of the history to replay

fields.name: id
fields.description:
Stringified UUIDv4.
See [RFC 4112](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc4122)

codeSamples.name: Moralis NodeJS SDK

codeSamples.code:
from moralis import streams

api_key = "YOUR_API_KEY"
params = {
    "streamId": "", 
    "id": "", 
}

result = streams.history.replay_history(
    api_key=api_key,
    params=params,
)

print(result)

fields.name: id
fields.description:
Stringified UUIDv4.
See [RFC 4112](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc4122)

fields.name: totalWebhooksDelivered
fields.description: The total amount of webhooks delivered across all streams

fields.name: totalWebhooksFailed
fields.description: The total amount of failed webhooks across all streams

fields.name: totalLogsProcessed
fields.description: The total amount of logs processed across all streams, this includes failed webhooks

fields.name: totalTxsProcessed
fields.description: The total amount of txs processed across all streams, this includes failed webhooks

fields.name: totalTxsInternalProcessed
fields.description: The total amount of internal txs processed across all streams, this includes failed webhooks

fields.name: streams
fields.description: Array of stream stats

fields.name: totalWebhooksDelivered
fields.description: The total amount of webhooks delivered across all streams

fields.name: totalWebhooksFailed

fields.name: totalTxsProcessed

fields.name: totalTxsInternalProcessed

fields.description: The stream id

fields.name: createdAt

fields.name: updatedAt
fields.description: The date since this stats were last updated

GetStreams.description: Get all the evm streams for the current project based on the project api-key.

fields.name: result
fields.description: Array of project Streams

fields.name: webhookUrl
fields.description: Webhook URL where moralis will send the POST request.

fields.name: description
fields.description: A description for this stream

fields.name: tag
fields.description: A user-provided tag that will be send along the webhook, the user can use this tag to identify the specific stream if multiple streams are present

fields.name: topic0
fields.description: An Array of topic0's in string-signature format ex: ['FunctionName(address,uint256)']

fields.name: allAddresses
fields.description: Include events for all addresses (only applied when abi and topic0 is provided)

fields.name: includeNativeTxs
fields.description: Include or not native transactions defaults to false

fields.name: includeContractLogs
fields.description: Include or not logs of contract interactions defaults to false

fields.name: includeInternalTxs
fields.description: Include or not include internal transactions defaults to false

fields.name: includeAllTxLogs
fields.description: Include all logs if atleast one value in tx or log matches stream config

fields.name: getNativeBalances
fields.description: Include native balances for each address in the webhook

fields.name: filter
fields.description:
The filter object for the topic0
https://docs.moralis.io/docs/filter-streams

fields.name: chainIds
fields.description: The ids of the chains for this stream in hex Ex: ["0x1","0x38"]

fields.name: demo
fields.description: Indicator if it is a demo stream

fields.name: triggers
fields.description: triggers

fields.name: functionAbi
fields.description: The abi to parse the log object of the contract

fields.name: id
fields.description:
Stringified UUIDv4.
See [RFC 4112](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc4122)

fields.name: status
fields.description:
The stream status:
[active] The Stream is healthy and processing blocks
[paused] The Stream is paused and is not processing blocks
[error] The Stream has encountered an error and is not processing blocks

fields.name: statusMessage
fields.description: Description of current status of stream.

fields.name: cursor
fields.description: Cursor for fetching next page

fields.name: total
fields.description: Total count of streams on the project

codeSamples.name: Moralis NodeJS SDK

from moralis import streams

api_key = "YOUR_API_KEY"
params = {
    "limit": 1.2, 
    "cursor": "", 
}

result = streams.evm_streams.get_streams(
    api_key=api_key,
    params=params,
)

print(result)

codeSamples.code:
from moralis import streams

api_key = "YOUR_API_KEY"
params = {
    "id": "", 
    "limit": 1.2, 
    "cursor": "", 
}

result = streams.evm_streams.get_addresses(
    api_key=api_key,
    params=params,
)

print(result)

fields.name: webhookUrl
fields.description: Webhook URL where moralis will send the POST request.

fields.name: tag
fields.description: A user-provided tag that will be send along the webhook, the user can use this tag to identify the specific stream if multiple streams are present

fields.name: functions
fields.description: An Array of events in string-signature format ex: ['0x1::aptos_account::transfer']

fields.name: events
fields.description: An Array of events in string-signature format ex: ['0x1::coin::WithdrawEvent']

fields.name: network
fields.description: The network to listen to

fields.name: includePayload
fields.description: Include or not payload for every transaction in webhook defaults to false

fields.name: includeEvents
fields.description: Include or not events in webhook defaults to false

fields.name: includeChanges
fields.description: Include or not raw changes for every transaction in webhook defaults to false

fields.description: Indicator if it is a demo stream

fields.description: Include events for all addresses (only applied when at least one event or function is provided)

fields.name: status
fields.description:
The stream status:

[error] The Stream has encountered an error and is not processing blocks
